text: Great men are seldom over-scrupulous in the arrangement of their attire.
author: Charles Dickens

text: Men do not quit playing because they grow old they grow old because they quit playing.
author: Oliver Wendell Holmes

text: Men give away nothing so liberally as their advice.
author: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

text: Men get to be a mixture of the charming mannerisms of the women they have known.
author: F. Scott Fitzgerald

text: The first rule of business is: Do other men for they would do you.
author: Charles Dickens
